title: Proper Nutrition
runButtonInstructions: TO GET RECOMMENDATIONS FOR THE PERIOD:
advice: Not all recommendations are followed. Try selecting different products {products}, changing settings {settings}, or exclude from the diet {ration} foods that contain more nutrients than you need per day.

result.title: Products for consumption for the selected period:
result.nutrientsHeader: Balance of nutrients in the diet{recommendations}:

tooltip.low: {low} - office worker doing little or no exercise;
tooltip.medium: {medium} - a builder or a person running an hour a day;
tooltip.high: {high} - agricultural worker (not mechanized) or a person who swims two hours a day.

intake.title: Daily intake
intake.tooltip: Unlocked {icon} values do not change when user preferences are changed.

help: Specify your parameters in the settings {settings}. {img} The limits of daily consumption depend on them.
You can unlock the input fields in the daily intake table and enter your own preferences. {img} Unlocked fields do not automatically change when settings are changed.
You can specify one of the nutrients in the daily intake table as the desired maximum or minimum. {img} The application will take this into account when calculating recommendations.
In the Ration tab {ration}, add the foods you ate. {img}
On the Products tab {products}, mark the products among which you want to search for recommendations. {img}
On the Home tab {home}, click the button. {img}
